pages.title: Vectorize Jet Engine
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Thrust vectoring engine with no energy cost.

pages.title: Correct Placement
pages.text: Correct placement is confirmed by visible thrust particles and directional changes.
Main Panel $(br2)$(li)Thrust: Set/observe thrust.$(li)Horizontal/Vertical: Thrust vector angles.$(br2)Direction conventions depend on placementâ€”observe the rudder.
Redstone Panel $(br2)Inputs: Thrust, Horizontal, Vertical. Each channel has multiple extra channel for min/max.$(br) See general redstone panel documentation.
Notes $(br2)$(li)Thrust originates from the engine block. Rudders are visual guides only.
